publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7247 Jim Mather: The Official Statistics (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Official Statistics (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
